memberdef.argsstring: (nfs_arg_t *parg, exportlist_t *pexport, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, hash_table_t *ht, struct svc_req *preq, nfs_res_t *pres)
memberdef.name: nfs_Mkdir

detaileddescription.para: nfs_Mkdir: The NFS PROC2 and PROC3 MKDIR
Implements the NFS PROC MKDIR function (for V2 and V3).

parameterdescription.para: [IN] credentials to be used for this request
[IN] pointer to SVC request related to this call
[OUT] pointer to the structure to contain the result of the call

simplesect.para: NFS_REQ_OK if successfull NFS_REQ_DROP if failed but retryable NFS_REQ_FAILED if failed and not retryable.

detaileddescription.para: nfs_Mkdir_Free: Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Mkdir.
Frees the result structure allocated for nfs_Mkdir.

briefdescription.para: evrythinhg you need to handle NFS PROC2-3 MKDIR.

detaileddescription.para:

deniel Date

Revision
1.21 Evrythinhg you need to handle NFS PROC2-3 MKDIR. MKDIR is used to create new directories
